amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 2111, which requires assessments and implementation of methods to reduce the consequences of a terrorist attack.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 111-327 to strike section 2111, which requires assessments and implementation of methods to reduce the consequences of a terrorist attack.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dent amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 236 (Roll no. 872).
